    • Method Detail

      • withPersistence

        ServiceTest.Setup withPersistence(boolean enabled)

      • withCassandra

        ServiceTest.Setup withCassandra(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable Cassandra.

        If enabled, this will start an embedded Cassandra server before the tests start, and shut it down afterwards. It will also configure Lagom to use the embedded Cassandra server.

        Parameters:
        enabled - True if Cassandra should be enabled, or false if disabled.
        Returns:
        A copy of this setup.

      • withConfigureBuilder

        ServiceTest.Setup withConfigureBuilder(java.util.function.Function<play.inject.guice.GuiceApplicationBuilder,play.inject.guice.GuiceApplicationBuilder> configureBuilder)

      • configureBuilder

        ServiceTest.Setup configureBuilder(java.util.function.Function<play.inject.guice.GuiceApplicationBuilder,play.inject.guice.GuiceApplicationBuilder> configureBuilder)
        Configure the builder.

        Allows a function to be supplied to configure the Play Guice application builder. This allows components to be mocked, modules to be enabled/disabled, and custom configuration to be supplied.

        Parameters:
        configureBuilder - The builder configuration function.
        Returns:
        A copy of this setup.

      • withCluster

        ServiceTest.Setup withCluster(boolean enabled)
        Enable clustering.

        Disabling this will automatically disable any persistence plugins, since persistence requires clustering.

        Parameters:
        enabled - True if clustering should be enabled, or false if disabled.
        Returns:
        A copy of this setup.

      • cassandra

        boolean cassandra()
        Whether Cassandra is enabled.

      • cluster

        boolean cluster()
        Whether clustering is enabled.

        java.util.function.Function<play.inject.guice.GuiceApplicationBuilder,play.inject.guice.GuiceApplicationBuilder> configureBuilder()
        The builder configuration function
